titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation against the oppression of the clergy by the intrusion of factious and schismaticall persons into their cures, and inverting and detaining their tithes and possessions by orders of one or both Houses of Parliament, contrary to all law and justice.
Proclamations. 1643-05-16.
